quotes.text: Discipline is choosing what you want most over what you want now.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Donâ€™t wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Small steps in the right direction become giant leaps over time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: What you do every day matters more than what you do once in a while.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin
